page.title: 12The Dairy at Calne.
page.content: The Calne Dairy at Quarr Barton gets its milk from Salisbury,where it is bottled.There are about twenty people working in the Calne depot.They have thirteen delivery vans,and deliver sixty six thousand eight hundred bottles of milk every week in Calne and nearby villages. The roundsmen also deliver cheese, butter,eggs,potatoes,fruit juices, bread,yoghurt and all kinds of pop. They also run a club for Christmas hampers.You pay a small amount of money to your milkman every week during the year,until you have enough for your hamper.
